tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest
(
    disclosure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    affiliation VARCHAR(255),
    research_topic VARCHAR(255),
    financial_interest DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest_disclosures (
    disclosure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    disclosure_date DATE,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(50),
    conflict_description TEXT,
    pharmaceutical_company VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE disclosures (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    author VARCHAR(255),
    disclosed_company VARCHAR(255),
    disclosure_date DATE,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    disclosure_date DATE,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    physician_name VARCHAR(255),
    conflict_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE physicians (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialty VARCHAR(255),
    license_number VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE companies (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(255),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_officer_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE disclosures (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    physician_id UUID,
    company_id UUID,
    disclosure_date DATE,
    conflict_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    disclosure_text TEXT,
    author VARCHAR(255),
    date_disclosed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE authors (
    author_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    organization VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE organizations (
    org_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    org_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry_sector VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE disclosures (
    disclosure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    author_id UUID REFERENCES authors(author_id),
    disclosure_date DATE,
    disclosure_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE disclosure_comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    disclosure_id UUID REFERENCES disclosures(disclosure_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    commenter_name VARCHAR(255)
)
